subject: Warranty for X
description_text: Hello, I have a connectivity issue with my Simsonn Pro X pedalboard. It is recognized in the devices but not in the Simsonn software. Thank you for your feedback.

conversations.body_text: Hi jonathan benisti, Please press and hold the upgrade button on the control box, then reconnect the USB cable while holding the button. The software will detect the device in SIMSONN Flasher mode. Next, go to Settings → Update in the software, then click Manual Firmware Update. Navigate through the following folder path: pedals-firmware → pedals → select the file prox.sfu Click to update and wait for the process to complete. Once done, please test your device again to see if the issue is resolved.
Hello, great, thanks, everything is restored, it works perfectly.
